bibl.title: New Finds of Funerary Inscriptions in Banganarti (Christian Nubia).
bibl.note: Polish Joint Expedition to the Middle Nile, 2006. - Reedition of an epitaph discovered in 2003 [ed.: IDEM, Three Greek Epitaphs from Banganarti, JJurP 33 (2003) pp. 165-169 (= S.E.G. LIII-2, 2022)] with addition of a new fragment. - Edition of a fragmentary and a complete epitaph (second half of the 8th century and not later than the 8th century). - Pp. 146-152: The meaning of the term ἐπίτροπος in Christian Nubia.
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam, New Finds of Funerary Inscriptions in Banganarti (Christian Nubia).

Polish Joint Expedition to the Middle Nile, 2006. - Reedition of an epitaph discovered in 2003 [ed.: IDEM, Three Greek Epitaphs from Banganarti, JJurP 33 (2003) pp. 165-169 (= S.E.G. LIII-2, 2022)] with addition of a new fragment. - Edition of a fragmentary and a complete epitaph (second half of the 8th century and not later than the 8th century). - Pp. 146-152: The meaning of the term ἐπίτροπος in Christian Nubia.
